nodes.text: Gualaar were a type of quadruped animal with white fur, black eyes and a single large horn on their head. Four gualaar were used to pull the carriage that carried Senator Padmé Amidala's open casket at her funeral on the planet Naboo in 19 BBY.

Gualaar first appeared in the 2005 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. They were first identified in the current canon in Nexus of Power, a 2016 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny.
